text: [Music]
hi everyone and welcome back to lango
learning systems online video sessions
my name is thomas and i'm one of the
ielts practitioners here at lango music
is one of the most frequently discussed
topics in the ielts speaking exam
you may be asked questions about the
music you listen to a concert that
you've been to or a musical instrument
that you can play here are 15 words or
phrases related to music
for each one i'll give a definition and
an example of usage so that you can
understand how to apply the language
practically are you ready for the lesson
then let's get started a catchy tune a
tune or a song that's easy to remember
and that you enjoy singing
santong mtp is the producer of a wide
range of catchy songs many children can
sing these songs even if i don't happen
to know any of them he's still famous
right elevator music music that's played
in places like supermarkets or family
restaurants almost always very
repetitive and annoying
when i go shopping at the supermarket
sometimes i'm very annoyed by elevator
music also known as muzak to sing out of
tune to lack the proper musical pitch
people don't realize how easy it is to
be out of tune when you can't hear
yourself singing to be tone deaf
to recognize different notes or sing
tunes accurately i've always wished i
learned how to play a musical instrument
i'd love to be able to play the piano
but it's very hard for me as i think i'm
tone deaf with no ear for music at all
tuneful means pleasant or melodious
musical sounds i prefer to live in a
village close to nature because every
morning i can enjoy the tuneful bird
song it's such a wonderful experience
number six to play by ear this is to
play without reading the musical notes
some talented musicians can play
instruments by ear they feel the music
in their heart and intuit it by instinct
adoring fans people who love a
particular band or singer big bang is
one of the legends of k-pop with a
unique music style they've had millions
of adoring fans all over the world
apparently so i'm told
a slow number a song with a slow
tempo
i often listen to a slow number before i
go to sleep which helps me to fall
asleep more easily
number nine a piece of music a song or
composition i take a keen interest in
pieces of music that are played using
ancient musical instruments to take up a
musical instrument to begin learning a
musical instrument i took up a musical
instrument when i realized that all my
friends could play and i was the odd one
out i hope that you found this session
helpful in preparing you for your ielts
test
if you want to sign up for ielts courses
here at lango please click on the link
below
these ielts courses are designed to
cater to your individual needs and to
provide personalized learning pathways
remember to like and subscribe and
please don't forget to hit the bell
button to get notifications of our
latest video uploads
see you next time goodbye
